game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the depths of the temple
game.description: Legend has it that the ancient civilization of Eldarath hid a powerful scroll within their lost temple. The scroll is said to hold the secrets of the universe, and many have attempted to retrieve it before. Will you be the one to succeed?
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and the blessings of the gods

tasks.objective: Enter the temple through the hidden entrance
tasks.description: Make your way to the ancient stone door in the heart of the forest. The entrance is guarded by a powerful entity, but with courage and determination, you can overcome it.

tasks.objective: Solve the riddle of the mirrors
tasks.description: Inside the temple, you will find a room filled with ancient mirrors. Solve the riddle etched onto the walls to unlock the next chamber.

tasks.objective: Defeat the guardian of the scroll
tasks.description: At the heart of the temple lies a powerful guardian. Defeat it in combat to claim the ancient scroll.
